Arena Tournament Names and Zero Tolerance
http://blue.mmo-champion.com/t/24401858154/inappropriate-character-and-team-names/
Believe it or not, the team and character names have to be appropriate or you face deletion!

Two Tiers of Cataclysm PVP Gear
http://blue.mmo-champion.com/t/24401796793/cataclysm-badge-and-pvp-point-changes/

The lower tier weapons will correspond in quality to items found in the latest raid tier on normal difficulty and cost only Conquest Points.
The higher tier weapons will correspond in quality to items found in the latest raid tier on Heroic difficulty and will have a minimum personal rating requirement in addition to costing Conquest Points
Buff homogenization and the Blues dont like you.
http://blue.mmo-champion.com/t/24401906297/shared-raid-lockouts-more-homogenized-buffs/
Raid buffs and debuffs exist for two main reasons:
